backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, storage mixins, and many domain types plus initial state maps and a user profile query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps content in AppShell.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyS: Empty admin-only layout or section placeholder.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientServ: Empty admin panel placeholder for client service request management.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for setting up a new user profile with identity-prefilled fields and role selection.
frontend/src/components/common/BlockedSt: Reusable card component showing a blocked state message with optional navigation action.
frontend/src/components/common/ChartBloc: Card wrapper for charts with a title and optional action slot.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Error display card with icon, message, and optional retry button.
Displays a lead summary card with status, niche icon, location, revenue, owner, and a button to open the detail dialog.
frontend/src/components/common/ProgressB: Renders a labeled progress bar with optional percentage or numeric value display.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Loads an image with a loading state and fallback initials if the image fails.
frontend/src/components/common/ServiceNi: Shows a 3D icon for a service or niche using SafeImage with generated fallback text.
frontend/src/components/common/StatsCard: Presents a stat card with title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and trend indicator.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealCard.t: Displays a deal summary with ID, status badge, value, and linked lead ID.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealDialog: Dialog for creating a new deal, capturing value and status, and submitting via hook.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDat: Provides export buttons for CSV, Excel, PDF-ready HTML, and RTF using export utilities.
Main layout with mobile header, sidebar navigation, and responsive content area.
frontend/src/components/leads/AddLeadDia: Dialog for adding a new lead with form fields, validation, and submission via hook.
frontend/src/components/leads/ImportLead: Dialog for uploading a CSV, parsing leads, and importing them with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/leads/LeadDetail: Displays lead details and allows updating the lead's status.
frontend/src/components/nav/FollowUpBadg: Shows a bell icon with optional count of follow-ups due, using placeholder logic.
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Sidebar navigation with links, branding, and session-clearing functionality.
frontend/src/components/outreach/StartOu: Form dialog to record a new outreach activity for a lead.
frontend/src/components/payments/Checkou: Checkout flow with payment method selection, order creation, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Lists user payments with status badges, service names, and admin status update controls. Handles loading, empty states, and formatting for dates, currency, and payment methods.
frontend/src/components/planner/PlannerP: Displays a planner plan with progress metrics, streak calculation, remaining days, and a list of daily tasks. Highlights today’s tasks and computes overall completion from task data.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Shows detailed project info with dates, milestones, attachments, and notes editing inside a dialog. Allows updating project data through a mutation.
Dialog for creating or editing a project with fields for service, client, notes, and status. Submits new or updated project data using project mutations.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Dialog showing full service details including price, delivery time, types, niche, deliverables, and requirements. Supports optional checkout action and uses a scrollable content layout.
Form dialog for creating or editing a service, managing field state, validation, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/uploads/Attachme: Displays uploaded attachments with preview, download, and optional removal actions.
Handles file selection, validation, upload progress, and returns uploaded ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/constants/uploadedImages.ts: Centralized map of static uploaded image asset URLs using publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgencyAnalytics.ts: Fetches agency analytics including leads, services, and projects via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRole.ts: Retrieves caller user role and admin status using backend actor with graceful fallback for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Provides hooks to create and fetch client service requests scoped by agency or user.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching, saving, and registering the caller’s user profile through backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeals.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for deals, currently returning placeholder data and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Exposes a hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportData.ts: Fetches exportable data such as leads, services, and projects, with deals and outreach returning empty arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login flow and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Offers queries and mutations for fetching, adding, updating, and importing leads, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreach.ts: Defines placeholder outreach query and mutation hooks that return local data and log unimplemented backend behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Includes hooks for creating payments, retrieving payment data, and updating payment status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentSettings.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update payment settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanner.ts: Implements in-memory planner plan management with hooks to fetch, create, and update planner tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Offers project-related queries and mutations, filtering by agency and supporting updates and completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Provides service management hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and seeding services with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus utility classes for layout, typography, and interactive states.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Fetches analytics data and renders KPIs and charts for revenue, deals, services, and niches.
Empty placeholder file for the client onboarding page.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays agency performance metrics, charts, and onboarding visuals using analytics and user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Loads user deals, groups them by status, displays them in columns, and provides a dialog to add new deals.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Provides paginated lead management with search, filters, and a dialog for adding leads.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Shows outreach activities grouped by platform and allows starting new outreach interactions.
frontend/src/pages/PlannerPage.tsx: Displays the 30‑day outreach planner, loads an existing plan or lets the user create a new one.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows all projects with progress, attachments, and details, and supports creating or viewing project info.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalSharePage.tsx: Public proposal view page that displays a placeholder message for a given proposal ID.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists services with search, activation, editing, seeding, and checkout options, using dialogs for management.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPricingPage.t: Shows predefined service pricing tiers and allows initiating checkout for a selected tier.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Handles user profile and payment settings editing with tabs, forms, and save/update operations.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login with optional identifier input to prefill user profile.
frontend/src/types/docx.d.ts: Type declarations for the docx library, defining enums and classes for building Word documents programmatically.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Type definitions for jspdf-autotable, specifying table structures, styling, and export options.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Type definitions for jsPDF, covering PDF creation methods, configuration, and output options.
frontend/src/types/local.ts: Local interfaces defining Deal and OutreachActivity data structures.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type declarations for the xlsx library, including workbook, worksheet, and utility functions.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Empty file reserved for admin allowlist utilities.
frontend/src/utils/assets/publicAssetUrl: Utility for generating base‑path‑aware URLs to public assets in the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/export/download.ts: Provides a helper to trigger browser downloads from Blob objects.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportCsv.ts: Generates CSV exports by formatting sections of export data into CSV strings.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportDocx.ts: Builds simple RTF-based Word-compatible export files using export data.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportPdf.ts: Generates printable HTML used as a PDF export via the browser print system.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportSchema.t: Defines field schemas and formatting for exportable entities and a helper for formatting field values.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportXlsx.ts: Creates minimal SpreadsheetML-based XLSX files without external libraries.
frontend/src/utils/export/filename.ts: Generates timestamped filenames and formatted timestamps for exported files.
frontend/src/utils/icons/serviceNiche3dI: Maps normalized service types and niches to 3D icon URLs with fallbacks and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/utils/leads/csv.ts: Parses CSV text into Lead objects with validation and error collection.
Defines a static catalog of service offerings with pricing and delivery details.
frontend/src/utils/services/serviceDetai: Provides helpers to parse, join, and validate newline‑based list fields.
frontend/src/utils/signInIdentifier.ts: Stores, classifies, normalizes, and compares sign‑in identifiers like email or phone.
frontend/src/utils/uploads/fileValidatio: Validates uploaded files for size, extension, and MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction and session‑backed persistence for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, containers, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current scope, architecture notes, known issues, and required assets, including plans for payments, authentication changes, and performance improvements. Tracks state versioning and outlines Bubble app data models, workflows, and missing configurations.
